plugins.name: Wonderflow
plugins.description:
Wonderflow organises your document into tidy numbered flows.


  • Choose frames to sort, and Wonderflow weaves its magic to organise, rename, and number them in an instant.
  • Drag and drop frames between any two frames for a quick switcheroo. Wonderflow will reorder the flow and update everything for you.
  • Tweak the spacing between flow frames and rows, and optionally align them all on the canvas, channeling your inner perfectionist.


You can update spacing and alignment without having to select any frames, but if you want to create a new flow or update the name of an existing flow, you will need to select the frames you want to affect.


See more details
plugins.tagline: Organise your documents into user flows

53877.name: Wonderflow
53877.description:
Wonderflow organises your document into tidy numbered flows.


  • Choose frames to sort, and Wonderflow weaves its magic to organise, rename, and number them in an instant.
  • Drag and drop frames between any two frames for a quick switcheroo. Wonderflow will reorder the flow and update everything for you.
  • Tweak the spacing between flow frames and rows, and optionally align them all on the canvas, channeling your inner perfectionist.


You can update spacing and alignment without having to select any frames, but if you want to create a new flow or update the name of an existing flow, you will need to select the frames you want to affect.


See more details
53877.release_notes:
1. No longer aligns the first row to 0,0 coordinates on the canvas*.
2. Added option to align flows to each other. Wonderflow will no longer do this by default for those who want more control over their layouts.

* You can still do this manually with the first flow in your document if you want and the plugin will organise everything in relation to that for you.
53877.tagline: Organise your documents into user flows

plugins.name: FlatInk - Convert Color Vector To Black And White Line Art
plugins.description:
FlatInc: Turn Vibrant Shapes into Timeless Line Art


FlatInc is the ultimate Figma plugin for transforming colorful illustrations into elegant black-and-white line art with ease. Whether you're creating wireframes, preparing for print, or simply seeking a minimalist aesthetic, FlatInc converts your selected shapes into stunning monochrome designs in just a click.


Perfect for designers who appreciate clean, adaptable visuals, FlatInc helps you streamline your creative process and focus on what matters most‚Äîyour vision.


Say hello to timeless art and goodbye to tedious manual conversions!


üëâ How to use FlatInc:


Select any shape in your design.

Run the plugin.

Click "Do Magic" ‚ú®.


It's that simple. Happy designing! üôå

accepted.name: Superfiles
accepted.description: Built with love by Team Superfiles ‚Äì 6 years of design magic, now packed into a plugin bundle that makes your Figma flow super. Welcome to effortless design.

plugins.tagline: Transform illustrations into timeless line art - Convert any Colorful Vector into Black And White

plugins.name: 8 Bit This
plugins.description:
Transform your images into nostalgic 8-bit pixel art with just a few clicks. Whether you're looking to add a retro look to your designs or simply experiment with pixel art, this plugin gives you full control over the pixelation effect.


‚Äî


How to Use?

  1. Select an image layer.
  2. Run the 8 Bit This plugin.
  3. Adjust the pixel size with the slider and preview the effect.
  4. Click "Pixelate image" to apply the effect to your image.


‚Äî


Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è in M√©xico using Cursor AI and Claude 3.5. Feedback is appreciated ‚Äîthank you!
plugins.tagline: Transform images into retro 8-bit pixel art with customizable pixelation.

plugins.name: Design System Visualizer
plugins.description:
Introducing Design System Visualizer Plugin, the game-changing Figma Plugin that empowers designers to effortlessly translate their brand's primary and secondary colors into a full set of Backbase tokens. Seamlessly integrated within Figma, this powerful tool revolutionizes the way Backbase customers bring their brand identities to life in Backbase products.


Gone are the days of manual token creation and tedious color matching. With Design System Visualizer Plugin, designers can unlock a world of possibilities, transforming their brand's colors into tangible, customizable tokens with just a few clicks.


How does it work? It's simple. Just input your brand's primary and secondary colors, and Design System Visualizer Plugin generates a comprehensive set of tokens that effortlessly reflect your brand identity. These tokens can be used across Backbase projects, ensuring a consistent and cohesive user experience that resonates with your audience.


Elevate your design workflow and transform colors into tokens with Design System Visualizer Plugin. Unleash your brand's potential and create captivating digital experiences that leave a lasting impact. Get started today and witness the power of seamless integration between Figma and Backbase.
plugins.tagline: Unleash the potential of your brand in Backbase‚Äôs products.

Gone are the days of manual token creation and tedious color matching. With Design System Visualizer Plugin, designers can unlock a world of possibilities, transforming their brand's colors into tangible, customizable tokens with just a few clicks.


How does it work? It's simple. Just input your brand's primary and secondary colors, and Design System Visualizer Plugin generates a comprehensive set of tokens that effortlessly reflect your brand identity. These tokens can be used across Backbase projects, ensuring a consistent and cohesive user experience that resonates with your audience.


Elevate your design workflow and transform colors into tokens with Design System Visualizer Plugin. Unleash your brand's potential and create captivating digital experiences that leave a lasting impact. Get started today and witness the power of seamless integration between Figma and Backbase.

98307.tagline: Unleash the potential of your brand in Backbase‚Äôs products.

plugins.name: Pixel Font
plugins.description:
Pixel Font is a powerful text pixelation tool that makes it easy to transform text into unique pixel art styles. With simple settings, you can customize font size, color, and boldness, as well as pixel color, size, spacing, and shape. Whether you're creating retro pixel art or modern design effects, this plugin meets all your needs.


Features include:

  1. Custom Text: Input the text you want to pixelate and adjust the font size and color.
  2. Bold Option: Choose whether to bold the text.
  3. Pixel Settings: Customize pixel color, size, and spacing, and select from different pixel shapes (such as square, circle, triangle, pentagon, star, hexagon).
  4. Insert Image: Export and insert the pixelated image into your design.
plugins.tagline: Pixelate your text and create unique pixel styles!

100138.name: Pixel Font
100138.description:
Pixel Font is a powerful text pixelation tool that makes it easy to transform text into unique pixel art styles. With simple settings, you can customize font size, color, and boldness, as well as pixel color, size, spacing, and shape. Whether you're creating retro pixel art or modern design effects, this plugin meets all your needs.


Features include:

  1. Custom Text: Input the text you want to pixelate and adjust the font size and color.
  2. Bold Option: Choose whether to bold the text.
  3. Pixel Settings: Customize pixel color, size, and spacing, and select from different pixel shapes (such as square, circle, triangle, pentagon, star, hexagon).
  4. Insert Image: Export and insert the pixelated image into your design.
100138.tagline: Pixelate your text and create unique pixel styles!

plugins.name: Sync Variable with Sheet
plugins.description:
How to run?

  1. Input Google Sheet Url, Sheet Name and name that you want to create variable collection.
  2. Then plugin parse sheet and cover the collection using sheet variables automatically


Demo Video

https://youtube link


Example

Sheet URL -> https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e0l6E8NdNwZZ0zZS94zYUV1Yn1997oFrMSTmrExcwDs/edit#gid=0

Sheet Name -> Sheet1

Collection Name -> lang

plugins.name: Atlima flutter exporter
plugins.description:
Flutter SVG -> TTF icons exporter.


To export you need:

  1. Install plugin.
  2. Open page with icons that you want to export.
  3. Select vectors to select.
  4. Go to Menu -> Plugins -> Atlima flutter exporter -> Run
  5. Enter Font name, prefix, suffix
  6. Download ZIP file with dart and font files.

plugins.name: Figmafolio - Export Figma Designs to Live Websites
plugins.description:
‚ö° About Figmafolio‚Ä®

Transform your Figma designs into live, interactive websites in minutes. No coding required!


üé® Key Features

  1. Instant Publishing: Your Figma design becomes a live website with its own URL in minutes.
  2. Responsive Design: Support for both desktop and mobile views, or publish as a responsive design.
  3. Preserve Interactivity: Maintain all your prototype's transitions, animations, and interactions in the live site.
  4. Real-time Updates: Changes in Figma reflect instantly on your live site.
  5. Custom Domain Support: Use your own domain name for a professional touch.
  6. Password Protection: Secure confidential work or NDA projects.
  7. Multiple Projects: Manage different sites with unique URLs for testing and client sharing.


üí° How to Use the Plugin‚Ä®

  1. Design in Figma: Create your website or portfolio using Figma‚Äôs design tools, including transitions, GIFs, and videos.
  2. Paste Prototype Links: Paste your Figma prototype links for desktop and mobile views (or just one for autolayout designs - enable 'Responsive' in the Figma prototype settings.).
  3. Check Out Your Work: Before publishing, use the preview option to see how your design looks.
  4. Go Live: Just click to publish your website and get your own URL.


üíº Perfect for:

  1. Designers showcasing their portfolio
  2. Startups launching landing pages
  3. Agencies presenting client work
  4. Anyone needing a quick, professional web presence


üåê Learn More About Figmafolio‚Ä®

Visit figmafolio.com now to bring your website vision to life!
plugins.tagline: Figma to live websites, effortlessly.

plugins.name: AutoLayouts
plugins.description:
Figma allows you to group objects and apply a common auto-layout, which is convenient. However, there are cases where you need individual auto-layouts for each selected object, and that's exactly what this plugin accomplishes.


HOW TO USE

Select objects ‚Üí Run plugin ‚Üí Voila! You get auto-layout added ‚úì


COMPATIBLE OBJECTS

The plugin works seamlessly with any object. For frames, it simply adds auto-layout, while other objects are enclosed within an auto-layout frame.


GitHub
plugins.tagline: Adds individual auto-layout to the selected objects

plugins.name: Weekly Planner
plugins.description:
Weekly Timeline Generator helps you create clean, organized weekly timelines for your projects in FigJam. Features include:


Generate timelines with weekly intervals instead of daily

Display date ranges for each week (e.g., 3/3 - 3/9)

Option to skip weekends for business-focused planning

Easily adjustable connectors for timeline customization

Bold, clear typography for better readability

Customizable timeline width

Perfect for project planning, roadmaps, sprint planning, and any time-based visualization needs.
plugins.tagline: Create weekly timeline views for your project planning in FigJam

plugins.name: Token Lab
plugins.description:
Convert your Figma variables into Design Tokens, ready for consumption by Style Dictionary.


The plugin requires at least one variable to exist in the Figma document. With that present, pressing the "Export Variables" button will convert the variables table into JSON objects, in the following structure:


// collection-1.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "my-variable": {

      "value": "#ffffff"

    }

  }

}


If variables are grouped the structure becomes:


// collection-1.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "group-name": {

      "my-variable": {

        "value": "#ffffff"

      },

      "another-variable": {

        "value": "#000000"

      }

    }

  }

}


If modes are used, those are added like so:


// collection-1-mode-one.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "group-name": {

      "my-variable": {

        "mode-one": {

          "value": "#ffffff"

        }

      }

    }

  }

}

// collection-1-mode-two.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "group-name": {

      "my-variable": {

        "mode-two": {

          "value": "#000000"

        }

      }

    }

  }

}


If a description is added to a variable, it will be included as a comment:


// collection-1.json 

{

  "collection-1": {

    "my-variable": {

      "value": "#ffffff",

      "comment": "A Figma description"

    }

  }

}


This plugin has primarily been built and tested for one specific team, your mileage may vary.
plugins.tagline: Generate Design Tokens from Figma Variables

80027.name: Token Lab
80027.description:
Convert your Figma variables into Design Tokens, ready for consumption by Style Dictionary.


The plugin requires at least one variable to exist in the Figma document. With that present, pressing the "Export Variables" button will convert the variables table into JSON objects, in the following structure:


// collection-1.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "my-variable": {

      "value": "#ffffff"

    }

  }

}


If variables are grouped the structure becomes:


// collection-1.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "group-name": {

      "my-variable": {

        "value": "#ffffff"

      },

      "another-variable": {

        "value": "#000000"

      }

    }

  }

}


If modes are used, those are added like so:


// collection-1-mode-one.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "group-name": {

      "my-variable": {

        "mode-one": {

          "value": "#ffffff"

        }

      }

    }

  }

}

// collection-1-mode-two.json

{

  "collection-1": {

    "group-name": {

      "my-variable": {

        "mode-two": {

          "value": "#000000"

        }

      }

    }

  }

}


If a description is added to a variable, it will be included as a comment:


// collection-1.json 

{

  "collection-1": {

    "my-variable": {

      "value": "#ffffff",

      "comment": "A Figma description"

    }

  }

}


This plugin has primarily been built and tested for one specific team, your mileage may vary.
80027.release_notes: Added settings panel, where collections can be excluded from exports.
80027.tagline: Generate Design Tokens from Figma Variables

plugins.name: Zero Frame
plugins.description:
Deprecation Notice: Auto Layout V4 with Absolute Positioning covers most, if not all, of the use-cases of this plugin. I recommend using that instead. This plugin will exist as is to avoid disrupting workflows, but future updates are unlikely.


Easily create, convert or wrap layers in zero frames.


Add zero frame: Add a zero frame to selected frames and auto layouts, or if nothing is selected, the canvas.


Convert to zero frame: Convert selected frames and auto layouts to zero frames while retaining their positioning properties.


Wrap in zero frame: Wrap selected layers in a zero frame.


What and Why?

A zero frame is a frame with either zero height or zero width. It occupies no space on the canvas but can position layers within in.


Zero frames are often used to add layers to auto layouts with absolute positioning i.e. they are not affected by the stacking order of other layers in the auto layout. Some novel uses of zero frames are detailed in this great talk from Figma Config 2021 - Pushing Figma to its limits with Chudo, Andrei, Gleb, Vitalii, Shuaiqi.


Open Source

Zero Frame is open source and contributions are welcome.
plugins.tagline: Create, convert or wrap layers in zero frames

33129.name: Zero Frame

What and Why?

plugins.name: Movie data uploader
plugins.description:
Movie data uploader

Plugin for populating movie cards with data from a local data storage.

Image files from local must be named as follows:

E.g. "Avatar-2022"

(if the name of the movie is contained from multiple words separate them with space)

Naming elements inside a card element:

Element for image must have a element named "image"..

Element must have a text element named "title".

Element must have a text element named "year".

Elements selection:

One or more cards needs to be selected.

Select only card elements and not the parent element that contains card elements.

plugins.name: Based CDN
plugins.description:
Based CDN

basedcdn.com is a design to development asset pipeline. We make it possible for your design team to seamlessly make updates to assets in production without requiring development resources. We enable your team to make required design changes and publish these to a CDN. Once published you can share all of your asset URL's with development to use as the asset source.


How to Install

  1. Install on Figma plugin community
  2. Provide your email and namespace.
  3. Start publishing your assets.
  4. Share your BasedCDN URL's with your development team.


FAQ

What is BasedCDN?

  • BasedCDN is a design to development asset pipeline. We make it possible for your design team to seamlessly make updates to assets in production without requiring development resources. We enable your team to make required design changes and publish these to a CDN. Once published you can share all of your asset URL's with development to use as the asset source.

Why do you need my email?

  • We use your email as your internal ID and as a way to communicate with you.

What is a namespace?

  • The namespace is used as a unique resource identifier. This namespace will be used on all of your URL's in this format: https://static.basedcdn.com/<namespace>/asset.png

How much does this cost?

  • Free! ...up to the first 10,000 requests. After your account has reached 10,000 requests we will contact you on our pricing options.

How long does it take to update?

  • Assets will update instantly but in somecases up to 15 seconds. After an asset is updated we invalidate all versions of the previously cached asset.

What format is the asset in?

  • We support PNG and SVG assets

How do I install my assets on NPM?

  • An NPM install link is provided while viewing all of your assets.




For more information please visit basedcdn.com

publisher.location: On the edge of the cloud
publisher.name: Based CDN

accepted.location: On the edge of the cloud

A simple tool to shear layers up to ¬±90¬∞ in each axis.


How to use


Select a layer, or group of layers, then use the sliders to adjust the shear angle for both horizontal and vertical axes. The shear transformation is applied in real time and can be adjusted or removed at any time.


From yours truly,

Ryan Nono

  2. Run the plugin.


Made by Sergei Goltsov

1. With punctuation and spaces: You can now apply underlining that takes punctuation and spaces into account. This allows for more precise highlighting of text elements.

2. Without punctuation and spaces: You can also choose the option to underline without considering punctuation and spaces, which is convenient for uniform text highlighting.

plugins.name: Bulk component instancer
plugins.description:
CSV Figma Component Instancer


This plugin creates multiple instances of a component with varying properties, driven by a simple CSV file whose rows define the properties of each instance.


Watch a demo:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IlWcNTyAD8o


For example the following CSV file would create 10 instances of a component with two TEXT properties (prop1 and prop2) and one BOOLEAN property (prop3):


prop1,prop2,prop3
my text field value,prop 2 valA,TRUE
prop1 valB,,1
B,,
valD,,0
valE,val2,FALSE
,,
,,
,,
,,
Values above use default property,,1


This is especially useful for e.g. creating tables, where you define a table row as a component with properties for the various text fields and optional boolean-displayed portions of each row.


Limitations:


  • Only TEXT and BOOLEAN property types are supported
plugins.tagline: Create multiple instances of a component with varying properties, driven by a simple CSV file

50372.name: Bulk component instancer
50372.description:

my text field value,prop 2 valA,TRUE
prop1 valB,,1
B,,
valD,,0
valE,val2,FALSE
,,
,,
,,
,,
Values above use default property,,1


This is especially useful for e.g. creating tables, where you define a table row as a component with properties for the various text fields and optional boolean-displayed portions of each row.


Limitations:


  • Only TEXT and BOOLEAN property types are supported

50372.tagline: Create multiple instances of a component with varying properties, driven by a simple CSV file

plugins.name: Frontdrop
plugins.description:
Export your components and design system to Frontdrop, integrate the generated code into your web application codebase and publish your website or app.


How to use the plugin?

  • First create a new account here in Frontdrop app
  • Select the frame you want to tranform into code and run our plugin
  • Hit ‚ÄúSend to Frontdrop‚Äù
  • Go to your dashboard and your code is ready


Code Export

Limitations

The current version of the Frontdrop design to code plugin does not yet support

  • Responsive code (WIP)

plugins.name: Figma to css and html by plantcss | Figma to code
plugins.description:
Description

Convert Figma design layers properties and values to HTML and CSS values for Frontend and Web UI Development. This plugin is developed from UI engineer perspective. This plugin main concept is reduce conversion time of convert Figma design to webpage development. So, this plugin is very useful for if your beginner or expert.


Features

  1. Support all text properties ( font-family, font-size, color and so on ) except transform values.
  2. Figma blend mode to CSS mix-blend-mode
  3. Export all type of Figma design gradient to CSS gradient values, It is also in the border.
  4. Different text properties in same line of text, it shows individual values to each.
  5. Figma filter blur and backdrop blur to CSS filter blur
  6. Figma drop and inner shadow to CSS box shadow
  7. Text border both solid and gradient colors convert to CSS.
  8. Plugin window resize option available. So, you can change the size plugin window size for a better work experience.
  9. Dark theme and Light theme support
  10. Quickly run the plugin with the help of shortcut plugin run button.


How to use plugin

  1. Just run the plugin
  2. After successfully plugin run, select any layer, you wish to convert.
  3. Selected design layer properties and values converted quickly and shown immediately.
  4. Select the code and copy values, to paste where you want.


Limitations

In case if some CSS properties not available for the current version, it will added future release versions. For a current version CSS codes only available, HTML code will be added later.


Drop your comment and share to other designer and developers.
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma design to css and html code for frontend development

  8. Plugin window resize option available. So, you can change the size plugin window size for a better work experience.

plugins.name: Cult Translator
plugins.description:
With more than 180 languages, Cult Translator is a next-generation translator plugin for Figma designed to make your translations easy, fast, and precise. By allowing you to add context, this tool ensures that every translation reflects the true intent of your original design.


Context-Driven Accuracy:


Enhanced Reliability: Provide context such as ‚ÄúThis button triggers a payment process‚Äù or ‚ÄúUsed in a formal corporate environment,‚Äù and the AI will deliver translations that capture the intended tone and meaning.


Clarifying Ambiguities: For example, if your design uses the term ‚Äúpitch,‚Äù a context note like ‚Äúreferring to a sales pitch‚Äù prevents misinterpretation, ensuring the right word is chosen in the target language.


Localization:


Beyond just word-for-word translation, Cult Translator adapts your content to the cultural nuances of your target audience. This means that regional references (e. g. people's names, music genres, foods, dance styles, currency types, etc.) are adjusted so your message resonates naturally with local users.


Export for Review:


Keep track of every change! The plugin allows you to export a detailed log of all translations, enabling designers, translators, and reviewers to collaborate efficiently and ensure consistency across your projects.


How to Use:


  1. Select Elements: Choose text layers, groups, or frames in your design.


  1. Add Context: Enter any additional context in the dedicated field to guide the translation process.


  1. Choose Languages: Select your source and target languages using our intuitive, searchable dropdown menus.


  1. Translate & Localize: Click ‚ÄúTranslate‚Äù for a context-enhanced conversion or ‚ÄúLocalize‚Äù for a culturally adapted version.


  1. Export Log: Easily export a review log of all translations for quality control and collaboration.


Works on Figma and FigJam:


Designed for both Figma and FigJam, Cult Translator works smoothly across platforms, making it perfect for design teams and collaborative environments.


Light & Dark Mode Support:


Enjoy a visually consistent experience regardless of your theme preference. CultTranslator is optimized for both light and dark modes.

plugins.name: Pixellink Variable Toolkit
plugins.description:
Unlock Figma's full potential with the Pixellink Toolkit, the ultimate solution for managing and applying variables directly within your designs. This dynamic design tool is crafted to seamlessly integrate into your Figma workflow, empowering designers with efficiency and precision. With Pixellink, you can effortlessly apply number variables for exact spacing, gaps, and fixed sizes and swiftly color assets with colour variables right in the viewport.


Designed for design customization and scalability, Pixellink enhances your creative workflow optimization, making quick style changes and theme management straightforward. Leverage this adaptive design setting tool for consistent, variable-driven design across your projects. Elevate your design process, harness the power of Figma's variables with Pixellink, and revolutionize your workflow for a productive and efficient design experience.


Website: www.pixellink.design

Email: team@pixellink.design

Discord: https://discord.gg/2kb68cPqk

plugins.name: Fix Detached Instances
plugins.description:
Fix Detached Instances plugin helps you find and reattach detached instances. It lists all detached instances in the file and allows you to easily locate them. Reattach them to the original main component one by one or in bulk. Any changes you made to the detached instances would be preserved as overrides where possible. For more details check documentation. Support: gleb@dominate.design


‚Üí Get unlimited license

Fix Detached Instances + Master plugin


Free trial allows you to attach 5 instances for free. This plugin goes hand in hand with Master plugin in the daily workflow so both plugins are purchased together as a bundle. Get Master license and enjoy unlimited usage of both plugins.


How to deal with detached instances

When you find a detached instance, there are two approaches you could take to bring your design back to consistency: restore the instance or extend the component. Using Master and Fix Detached Instances plugins you can choose which approach to take.


1. Reattach: use Fix Detached Instances plugin to restore the instance back to the original state without losing overrides. In order to preserve overrides, make sure the detached instance has the same layer order and hierarchy as the original main component.


2. Extend: find the detached instance using Fix Detached Instances and use Master ‚Üí New Component from Objects feature in order to create a new component from it. Then simply move the newly created component to the variant set together with the original component.


Support contact: gleb@dominate.design
plugins.tagline: Find and reattach detached instances without losing overrides
